title: Boğaziçi
inscriptions/marks: Ön: "Turkey in Asia", "Bosphorus", "Turkey in Europe"; Arka: "This photo was taken when we went at the Bosphorus abut 5 miles but the film was not very grand dear it was what you sent me, the best is Kodak Films as a rule. This is not a very good print but it is a bit of paper I had given me to try. My developer was properly used, but I shall get a hundred ashore of these Post bardo for use they are much cheaper than home I've paid 1/6 for a dozen home out here they 2/6 a hundred dear"
